definitions.definition: Any of various elongate fish from the family Echeneidae , the dorsal fin of which is in the form of a suction disc that can take a firm hold against the skin of larger marine animals .
A delay ; a hindrance , an obstacle .
A surgical instrument , intended to retain parts in their places .

main_definition: Any of various elongate fish from the family Echeneidae , the dorsal fin of which is in the form of a suction disc that can take a firm hold against the skin of larger marine animals . [from mid 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A delay ; a hindrance , an obstacle .
( obsolete , surgery ) A surgical instrument , intended to retain parts in their places .
